```{r}
f1<-function(n){
u=0.25;
sigma=u*(1-u);
x=c(0:0)
for (j in 1:1000){
#  s=0;
 # for (i in 1:1000)
  #  s<-s+rbinom(1,1,u);
  s<-rbinom(1,n,u)
  y=(s-n*u)/(sqrt(n*sigma));
  x<-c(x,y);
}
hist(x,freq=F,main =paste( "n=",n))
curve(dnorm(x),add=T,col="red")
}
```


```{r}
par(mfrow=c(2,3))
for(i in c(1,10,100,1000,10000,100000))
f1(i)
```
